pr_title: Add shift-modifier to bank deposit box

timeline.message: Add shift-modifier to bank deposit box.

timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: It also may be worth inverting this logic so it doesn't break any non-bank cases now where it happens to work, though I am not aware of any.
replies.author: Adam-

timeline.message: Fix seed vault bug deposit bug. Default to original behaviour instead.
